title: Grand Theft Auto V
notes:
Follow the dxvk config explained in other posts but as of september 8 you also need to disable esync, your launch options should look like following:
DXVK_CONFIG_FILE=/home/user/gta_dxvk.conf PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%

title: SHOGUN: Total War - Collection
notes: A totally blank launcher screen; after leaving it the game crashed

title: SHOGUN: Total War™ - Gold Edition
notes: Launcher screen is completely blank, but areas are clickable.
